title: Episode 205 | Azure news for Containers, Nested Virtualization & new VM sizes for Azure and AWS
description:
In this 205th episode, AC & CJ cover the latest news in the GCP, Azure and AWS news and some fun picks at the end!

Notes:

  • GPC & Azure Container News
    • Azure Container Registry adds individual identity, webhooks, and delete capabilities
    • Container Engine now runs Kubernetes 1.7 to drive enterprise-ready secure hybrid workloads
  • Azure News
    • Event Hubs Capture (formerly Archive) is now Generally Available
    • Nested Virtualization in Azure
    • Introducing the new Dv3 and Ev3 VM sizes
    • Microsoft announces Project Olympus support for new Intel Xeon Scalable Processors
    • New Public Preview: Azure AD Domain Services admin UX in the new Azure Portal
    • Azure Service Monitor
    • Azure Friday - Azure Network Watcher
  • AWS News
    • New – Next-Generation GPU-Powered EC2 Instances (G3)
  • Listener Pick by Paul Schaeflein
    • Langley Turns 100
  • CJ’s Picks
    • Get eyes in the sky with your Raspberry Pi
  • AC’s Picks
    • Getting Started with Headless Chrome
    • NASA releases ‘dramatic Pluto flyover’ video

With Nintex, work just flows, so your teams can work smarter, work faster and be more connected than ever.


Give Codeship Pro a try! More teams than ever are using Docker and Linux for their .NET applications.
